comment.author: 9719062@N07
comment._content: According to Brown’s Toronto General Directory, 1856 (p. 107), Samuel Booth & Son, Painters, was at the corner of Adelaide and Victoria Streets.

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: Thank you very much. I've amended the mapping accordingly.

comment.author: 83940818@N05
comment._content: The first 19 photos are by Armstrong, Beere and Hime and taken app. 1856-57. See the following: www.toronto.ca/archives/earliest_4_whowere.htm
